1223960.name: Dark Devotion Soundtrack
1223960.description:
Dark Devotion - Soundtrack - Enlight the path you've chose to go through with the enchanting original soundtracks of Dark Devotion.

Track List


● Hold Breath
● Filthblood Shelter
● Study
● Reveal
● Website

World 1

● Adonias
● Child of Limbo
● Executioner (part 1)
● Executioner (part 2)
● Hezek (part 1)
● Hezek (part 2)
● Jezebel
● Martyr
● Afflicted Village
● Ancient Dungeon
● Gloomy Cellblock
● Putrid Sewers
● Ancient Armory
● Cabinet of Curiosities
● Room of the Forgotten

World 2

● The Anomaly
● The First One (part 1)
● The First One (part 2)
● The Mysterious Entity (part 1)
● The Mysterious Entity (part 2)
● The Virgin
● Appearance
● The Cave of Cries
● The Graceless Forest
● The Purged Hamlet
● The Ancient's Incubator
● The Glade
● The Heart
● The Rotten Houses

World 3

● Elemiah (part 1)
● Elemiah (part 2)
● Nekosh (part 1)
● Nekosh (part 2)
● Ritualist
● Sariandel
● The Carnelian Palace
● The Obsidian Cathedral
● A Prince's Tomb
● The Anteroom of the Light

World 4

● Asriel
● Aureus & Elinor
● Chimera
● Holy Guardian
● The Queen
● Heraldic Lily
● Last Path
● Puzzle

Composed by Arthur Dos Santos, this 54 tracks album will guide you all the way through the darkness of the Fallen Temple.
1223960.supported_languages:
英语*, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 韩语, 日语, 波兰语, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
